name: serial-nw-setting-prompt
description: This prompt guides an AI agent to connect to a Fortinet device via serial communication to check its FortiOS version. The agent interacts step-by-step using tools like serial-open and serial-message, retrieves the installed version, fetches the latest version from Fortinetâ€™s official site, compares them, and reports whether an update is needed. User input (e.g., baud rate) is requested only when required.
